replies.body: Will the '**Project Capsules**' be taken out from the Store when the PROJECT: Hunters event ends?
You have till December 5th to earn tokens and do the missions, but January 9th to actually redeem the capsules.
I was more referring to the purchasing of the '**Project Capsules**' for the advertised 700rp
The Project Capsules and Orbs, as well as the bonus tokens through regular Hextech chests, will also be removed from the store today.
Ah gotcha, I don’t really know.
on jan the 8th i think it says

In OverCharge, why was is it all just marksmen?
Because although Jhin maybe a marksman you have champs like Vi and Leona who arn't.
Does this mean that there will be a "Project : Tanks" or something close to that?

As an ARAM only player, this event means nothing to me.

I receive 16 tokens through playing ARAM, which buys nothing of significance.

Yet another event IDGAF about, Riot is making a habit of that.
Game is shitballs atm, but keep giving them money, lmao.

I call FUBAR on LoL, prove me wrong.
